ClassDef.Name: PreferencesService

Properties.Name: UsePhotoMode
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player has photo mode enabled.

Properties.Name: UsePostProcessing
Properties.Description: Determines whether the player has post-processing effects enabled.

Events.Name: SettingChanged
Events.Description: Fired when a user preference setting is changed.

ClassDef.Description: PreferencesService is a service that allows scripts to access some of the user preferences
